Topic.Title: Now it is official: America needs more gun control

Message.Msg: So this conservative person wants more gun control. Have we not tried to regulate and control explosives? We learned from that mistake.

Topic.Title: Now it is official: America needs more gun control

Message.Msg: So if folks start using explosives to kill I suppose, following your logic, we should have armed guards carrying dynamite and hand grenades. I mean the only thing that can stop a bad guy with dynamite is to face a good guy with dynamite (right there in the classroom).I mean that worked so well having guards carry weapons, carrying explosives makes lots of sense. Of course, along comes a crazy liberal who thinks maybe the way to decrease the killings is to make it very difficult to have dynamite and hand grenades ( and yes, guns and clips). Those liberals sure are crazy. More guns, more dynamite, more grenades that will stop deranged folks. It has worked great so far.

Topic.Title: Now it is official: America needs more gun control

Message.Msg: Yes, as horrible it is the murder of these innocent kids, guns actually save many more lives. Just think how terrible crime would be in the USA, if our Officers weren't armed. Everyone should read that book, "Thin Blue Line".

Message.Title: Jan 2014, 30 Million Uninsured Clog Up Our System
Message.Msg: This coming 2013, if you've been considering an elective surgery. Now is the Time. Many excellent Docs will retire this year cause of their lowered Medicare payment reimbursements alone. Also, there's the big Yohoo headline. Barry may go after/tax your employer sponsored health care. It's just too big a pot of money to ignore. Happy New Year!
